body.bibl: Baranov, Vladimir. “Angels in the Guise of Saints: A Syrian Tradition in Constantinople.” In Saint Isaac the Syrian and His Spiritual Legacy: Proceedings from the International Patristics Conference, Held at the Sts Cyril and Methodius Institute for Postgraduate Studies Moscow, October 10-11, 2013, edited by Hilarion Alfeyev, 199–210.
